successes.title: SAM: The Ultimate Internet Connected Electronics Kit
successes.description: Start making without coding. Beginner or Expert, SAM is the ultimate electronics kit for inventors, artists, and students.

Pledges.description: SAM Thanks you with exclusive access to the SAM App. [VAT included]
Early bird SAM Explore is the easiest way to get started. Includes 3 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
SAM Explore is the easiest way to get started. Includes 3 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
Early bird SAM Learn gives you the secrets of coding. Includes 4 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
SAM Learn gives you the secrets of coding. Includes 4 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
Early Bird SAM Make turns even your crazy ideas into reality. Includes 8 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
SAM Make turns even your crazy ideas into reality. Includes 8 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
Early Bird SAM Pro is the ultimate access to controlling the IoT. Includes 12 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
SAM Pro is the ultimate access to controlling the IoT. Includes 12 SAMs + SAM App. [VAT Included]
SAM Pro+ = SAM Pro + limited early access to every other module we've designed to date (Proximity Sensor + Fan + Pressure Sensor + Rotational Pot + Vibration + Buzzer) + SAM App. [VAT Included]

SAM Family Special involves everyone around the table (SAM Pro, SAM Make, and SAM Learn). Also comes with a specially crafted instruction booklet filled with creations and ideas for everyone. [VAT included]

A 2-hour meet & chat with SAM Labs' founder Joachim + a unique signature SAM kit with modules bunched up by our founder. Joachim will set it up for you to continue enjoying the magic! [travel expenses not included]

A 5-hour workshop led by SAM Labsâ€™ founder, Joachim + 2 team members. As a team-building activity or an educational session for kids, SAM workshops from engineers and designers on the spot! [SAM kits & travel expenses not included]

Inspiring School Kit = 5 SAM Learn + 5 SAM Make + 5 SAM Pro. SAM Labs will personally come to your school for a day to work alongside teachers, run workshops, and ensure a great learning experience! [VAT Included]

Eternal Creator Kit = 5 SAM Pro + all our extra modules + a lifelong exclusive and free subscription to all our future modules before they are released. In addition, we will listen to your requests for new modules as we continue to grow our collection. [VAT + Free Worldwide Delivery Included]
